content: I have hijacked PR #14147 by @David Loeffler , completely removing a continuity assumption in his integrability theorem, at the cost of a much longer proof (the PR has gone up from 200 lines to 1000 lines). So, I feel a little guilty and I'd be happy if my move doesn't create too much delay. I've split most new material into #14527, #14528 and #14530. I'd be grateful for reviews!
